## goup-util gitignore

Manage .gitignore files for Gio projects

### Synopsis

Manage .gitignore files for Gio projects. Shows status and can generate appropriate gitignore patterns.

```
goup-util gitignore [project-path] [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for gitignore
```
